title: Creating Ranked team
body: Creating Fun Ranked team looking for all Roles - Must be Silver 2 or higher and preferably have skype. Add me if interested :) IGN: BryceBruz

replies.body: silver 2, have some experience in ranked 5s, I can play anywhere with jg being my strongest position

Silver 4, but I feel like I could bring some knowledge and ideas to the team. I shot call as well, and like BRUVA JAMES, I dont particularly enjoy solo que and would prefer to play R5's and improve.  Jungle/Support would be my prefer roles. I've added you as well. IGN: Rodmor
Silver 5. Feel like i would be higher (don't we all) if i played more ranked but don't particularly enjoy solo. I'm looking for a 5's for the first time
